title: Looking for Casual/Semi-Serious team
body:
Basically, title. I want to improve and become more versatile in the roles, positions and champions I play and figure that will be easier to achieve with a reliable team. Be warned, I do have this thing for 2-in-1 champions ("Quinn and Valor" and "Wolf and Lamb") so you'll probably see me playing them a lot more than other champions. In fact, I have been tempted recently to learn to jungle just so I can play Kindred a lot more.

I haven't played a PVP on SR for several months, I think, with the rare Co-op VS AI match in that time (usually with friends), so I am a little rusty on "normal" game-play (I enjoy ARAM, sue me). I did play my 10 provisional games last season (in the 36 hours leading up to the end) and got placed in Silver III, though I will admit I got carried in a couple games. I didn't end up playing any more ranked after that, mainly because I knew I wouldn't be able to get gold in that time and then, this season, I just never got around to it.

I can use VoIP programs to communicate, though don't ask for Skype because it hates me (I tried everything to fix it and it still has terrible quality). I have Teamspeak and Raidcall installed and are willing to try other programs. I'm available pretty much whenever at the moment and don't see that changing until the new school year starts (there's a course I'm looking to complete). As for positions, I'd say I'm best Top and ADC (though I do need to work on my CS), and am willing to Mid and Support. I can't jungle, though I am looking to change that (as I said earlier [for Kindred]).

You can feel free to check my match history, though don't be surprised when you find it full of ARAM games. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

replies.body: Hi, Whitefox Esports are looking for players. I have sent you a friend request.
